item.description: Meditation has a powerful impact on healing the body and the mind. It is also the doorway to the healing power of the soul, the source of all true healing. Learn how, through meditation, you can unleash your own healing power.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be introducing the speaker.
item.why: The speaker, Matthew Raider, MD, has presented programs on the healing power of meditation throughout the United States and Canada. He speaks from his experience as a physician and as a long-time meditator.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: Total Healing
